definitions.definition: A stopper, alternative to a cork, often made of rubber used to prevent fluid passing through the neck of a bottle, vat, a hole in a vessel etc.
A cecum or anus, especially of a slaughter animal.
The orifice in the bilge of a cask through which it is filled; bunghole.
To plug, as with a bung.
To put or throw somewhere without care; to chuck.
To batter, bruise; to cause to bulge or swell.
